parse.title: List of World War I films

text.*:
This is a list of World War I films.

This article contains Cyrillic text. Without proper rendering support, you may see question marks or boxes, misplaced vowels or missing conjuncts instead of Cyrillic letters.
A staged scene from
The Battle of the Somme

Contents

  • 1 Feature films
  • 2 Television films and series
  • 3 (Science) fiction and fantasy
  • 4 Documentary
  • 5 Derived conflicts
    • 5.1 Anglo-Irish War and Irish Civil War
    • 5.2 Russian Revolution and Russian Civil War
      • 5.2.1 Grigori Rasputin
    • 5.3 Turkish War of Independence
  • 6 See also
  • 7 Notes
  • 8 References

Notes[edit]

    This title should always be replaced by an English language release title when that information becomes available.

References[edit]

  1. ^ This film is available at the Internet Archive.
  2. ^ The film takes its name from the song "Marš na Drinu".
